cc.moecraft.icq

类 PicqBotX

  • java.lang.Object
    • cc.moecraft.icq.PicqBotX

  • public class PicqBotX
extends java.lang.Object
    The class PicqBotX is the main controller class of all the components of the CoolQ bot program.

    Class created by the HyDEV Team on 2019-03-23!

    从以下版本开始:
    2019-03-23 12:46
    作者:
    HyDEV Team (https://github.com/HyDevelop), Hykilpikonna (https://github.com/hykilpikonna), Vanilla (https://github.com/VergeDX)
